===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[natural]] {{gloss|produced by nature}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|天然|tr=tiānrán}} can only be used as an attributive to describe things that are literally produced by nature. Unlike the usual term for ''natural'', {{zh-l|自然}}, it cannot be graded or used figuratively.
